page.title: 14Thames Gravel Pits
page.content: { Folley Bros. Ltd,}have been operating at this site since the late 1930's. The washing plant is capable of producing about{150000 tonnes}of aggregates per annum, and is used to supply materials at a Ready Mixed concrete block production unit.The concrete plant uses their materials together with cement supplied by other manufacturers to make concrete of all designs and which is used in the construction of roads, bridges and house foundations etc. wherever concrete forms a basic material for the contractor. Fine sand and gravel are used for cement, coarser ballast for concrete. The plant has a work force of{25 people.}This plant is on the{Henley Road at Sonning Eye. The gravel pits are also used for {leisure activities}such as angling, wind_surfing, sailing & water_skiing.
